data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Dezhou, Shandong, China to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dezhou, Shandong, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Dezhou.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Dezhou, Shandong, China so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 390,480 believers living in the county of Dezhou. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Dezhou to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Dezhou, Shandong, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dezhou, Shandong, China has a population of 5,147,300.

We estimate Dezhou has 390,480 people who might know Jesus, 83,154 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,673,666 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Dezhou to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."
